algorithm.name: OCVYOLO
algorithm.description: Detects objects in images and videos using the Open Computer Vision (OCV) library using Yolo.

properties.name: DETECTION_CONFIDENCE_THRESHOLD
properties.description: Minimum detection confidence value [0...1] needed to keep detection and start a track.

properties.name: MIN_DETECTION_SIZE
properties.description: Minimum bounding box dimension in pixels to keep detection and start a track.

properties.name: DETECTION_FRAME_INTERVAL
properties.description: Number of frames to skip running the detector and rely on just tracking

properties.name: TRACKING_MAX_IOU_DIST
properties.description: Maximum intersection over union distance (1.0 - iou) =[0..1] between detections below which detection will be considered part of same track

properties.name: TRACKING_MAX_FEATURE_DIST
properties.description: Maximum distance in feature space (1.0 - cos similarity) = [0..1] between detections below which detection will be considered part of same track

properties.name: TRACKING_MAX_FRAME_GAP
properties.description: Maximum temporal distance (# of frames) between detection in a track.

properties.name: TRACKING_EDGE_SNAP_DIST
properties.description: Frame border as fraction of frame dimension within which detection bounding boxes are snapped to edge.

properties.name: TRACKING_DFT_SIZE
properties.description: DFT size for bbox alignment via phase correlation

properties.name: TRACKING_DFT_USE_HANNING_WINDOW
properties.description: Use hanning windowing with DFT (better registration, but slower).

properties.name: KF_MAX_ASSIGNMENT_RESIDUAL
properties.description: Maximim number of standard deviations of a kalman filter state residual that a potential detection assignment is allowed to cause.

properties.name: KF_DISABLED
properties.description: Disables the use of motion prediction via Kalman filtering during tracking.

properties.name: KF_RN
properties.description: Bounding box detector noise standard deviations (in pixels) [center_x_noise_stdev, center_y_noise_stddev, width_noise_stdev, height_noise_stddev] for Kalman filter R

properties.name: KF_QN
properties.description: Bounding box motion model acceleration inaccuracies/noise (in pixels/sec^2) [center_x_acceleration_noise_stdev, center_y_acceleration_noise_stdev, width_acceleration_noise_stdev, height_acceleration_noise_stdev ] for Kalman filter Q

properties.name: CUDA_DEVICE_ID
properties.description: CUDA device / GPU to use, -1 to only use CPU

properties.name: FALLBACK_TO_CPU_WHEN_GPU_PROBLEM
properties.description: if true will fallback to CPU only when GPU fails to initialize

actions.name: OCV YOLO DETECTION ACTION
actions.description: Executes the OpenCV Yolo detection algorithm using the default parameters.

actions.name: OCV YOLO DETECTION (WITH AUTO-ORIENTATION) ACTION
actions.description: Executes the OpenCV Yolo detection algorithm and rotates and/or flips media based on EXIF data or video metadata.

tasks.name: OCV YOLO DETECTION (WITH AUTO-ORIENTATION) TASK
tasks.description: Executes the OpenCV Yolo detection algorithm and rotates and/or flips media based on EXIF data or video metadata.

pipelines.name: OCV YOLO DETECTION (WITH MARKUP) PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Performs OpenCV Yolo detection and marks up the results.

pipelines.name: OCV YOLO DETECTION (WITH MOG MOTION PREPROCESSOR) PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Performs MOG motion preprocessing and OpenCV Yolo detection.

pipelines.name: OCV YOLO DETECTION (WITH SUBSENSE MOTION PREPROCESSOR) PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Performs SuBSENSE motion preprocessing and OpenCV face detection.

pipelines.name: OCV YOLO DETECTION (WITH MOG MOTION PREPROCESSOR AND MARKUP) PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Performs MOG motion preprocessing, OpenCV Yolo detection, and markup.

pipelines.name: OCV YOLO DETECTION (WITH SUBSENSE MOTION PREPROCESSOR AND MARKUP) PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Performs SuBSENSE motion preprocessing, OpenCV Yolo detection, and markup.

pipelines.name: OCV YOLO DETECTION (WITH AUTO-ORIENTATION) PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Executes the OpenCV Yolo detection algorithm and rotates and/or flips media based on EXIF data or video metadata.
